briefcase_deleted.description: Briefcase ID %u does not exist on the server, so it cannot be restored. You must acquire a new briefcase.

briefcase_deleted_only_remotely.description: Briefcase ID %u does not exist on the server, so the local briefcase cannot be re-used. You must acquire a new briefcase.

OpenBriefcaseFailed.description: Failed to open Briefcase with id %u.  Please contact Bentley Support for more information. Error code: %d. Error message: %s

AllJobsFailed.description: All processing Jobs of the Run failed.

SomeJobsFailed.description: Some Jobs of the Run were not successful.

AccessToDataSourceDenied.description: Access to the data source was denied.

FailedToAccessDataSource.description: Failed to access the data source.

RunSchedulingConflict.description: Failed to execute Run due to a scheduling conflict.

AffinityReportInvalid.description: Failed to read an affinity report.

FailedToAccessManifest.description: Failed to access the synchronization manifest.

DocumentNotFound.description: File is deleted or not accessible.

BridgeBatchPoolNotFound.description: Processing of this file type is not currently available.

FailedToRetryTask.description: Failed to orchestrate file processing retry.

BridgingSucceededWithCriticalError.description: Critical error(s) occurred during file processing.

NodeBecameUnusable.description: Azure batch node was in an unusable state.

foreign_format_too_old.description: The input file format is unsupported because it is too old. Please upgrade the input file to a newer version.

foreign_format_too_new.description: The input file format is unsupported because it is too recent. Please downgrade the input file to an older version.

launchdarkly_init_failed.description: The connector is unable to reach launch darkly.

legacyV8SchemaError.description: Failed to import legacy V8 schema.

protectedFile.description: Source file is protected and user does not have appropriate rights.

rootModelNotSpatial.description: An attachment to a 3D model has been detected. However, the root model is not a 3D model.

MissingWorkspace.description: %s could not find the required workset %s for the %s file.

CanNotOpenFile.description: %s: Cannot open the %s file; either the path is incorrect or the file is missing.

UnsupportedFile.description: The input file format is unsupported. It is likely mapped to the wrong connector. If not, please try to reload the file from its original location.

OutOfMemory.description: Failed to process the file due to low memory condition. Please try to use more extended Azure pool.

GeoLocationFailed.description: The input file has an unsupported or incorrect geo-location.

iModelHubError.description: Encountered an error while accessing iModelHub: %s

Unhandled_exception.description: The connector encountered an exception in phase: %s

JobAborted.description: A connector job can no longer continue and has been aborted in phase %s [%s]

DrawingFileWithWrongConfig.description: Do not use a 2D file as root model with sheets and drawings settings disabled.

UnmapInputFile.description: The given input file does not have a master job subject and cannot be unmapped.

UnmapInputFileUnknownError.description: Unknown error unmapping a missing file.

FailedToGenerateSchema.description: %s: Could not generate DG EC3 schema.

InconsistentURL.description: %s: Reference URLS need to start with %s, do you need to run ProjectWise ScanRefs?

BimBridgeInitError.description: %s: Server Configuration error, the Connector must be initialized using 'sync pre' keyin.

BridgeJobError.description: %s: Server Configuration error, the Connector Job can only be run once per session.

BridgeJobAlreadyLoaded.description: %s: the Connector Job could not be loaded or was loaded twice.

AuthoringApplicationNotFound.description: %s: Authoring application of active file not found.

FileIDPolicyMismatch.description: File ID policy mismatch between iModel and Feature Flags.

ProductInstallationPathNotFound.description: Could not get path to %s product installation. Please check the product is installed correctly on the ProjetWise WSG machine.

ConnectionTimeout.description: Connection timeout. Internet connection issue on server. Please contact your administrator and try again.

AuthenticationTypeNotSupported.description: Datasource authentication type is not supported. IMS or federated login is required for the user to access ProjectWise datasource. Please enable IMS authentication for the ProjectWise datasource.

UnexpectedError.description: Unexpected error happened. Please contact your administrator.

NotEnoughRightsInCONNECTEDContext.description: User does not have 'Read' RBAC Permission. Please give relative permission to the user.

iModelDmsSupportError.description: Encountered an error while downloading files from repository: %s

AzureBlobURLError.description: The specified Azure Blob URL may have expired or not authorized to download. Please check and pass correct Azure Blob Url.

FailedToFetchWorkspaceAndConfigFile.description: Failed to fetch workspace or generate workspace configuration file.

SourceFileDownloadFailed.description: Failed to download files from cache.

NetworkIssue.description: There was a network issue, please try again later.

BriefcaseCloseAndReopenFailed.description: Failed to close and reopen root file or briefcase during processing. Unable to continue processing.

UserLacksPssPermissions.description: User does not have required Product Settings Service permissions.

LockError.description: Connector was unable to acquire required locks: %s

GeodeticGCSNotSupported.description: The Geodetic coordinate systems is not supported.

MissingShapefileDbfShx.description: Mandatory Shapefile .dbf or .shx files are missing.

CannotGetRepositoryLink.description: Encountered an internal inconsistency with model identification. Please contact support.

SchemaUpgradeFailure.description: Connector failed to upgrade internal schemas.

CannotOpenADxPIDSource.description: Cannot open source %s. The file may be missing, corrupt, locked, or you may not have Visio installed.

CannotOpenSPPIDSource.description: Cannot open source %s. The file may be missing, corrupt, or unsupported.

IncorrectConfigVariable.description: %s Workspace error; configuration variable %s either not defined or has incorrect value

NonLinearUnits.description: The root model is not using linear units.

DuplicateDataFound.description: The file contains data that is spatial overlapping having similar identifiers compared to the existing content in the iModel. To prevent data problem the conversion was aborted. Details: %s

AnotherUserPushing.description: Another user is attempting to push data to the same iModel. Please try again in a few minutes.

ZeroByte.description: File %s has a size of 0 bytes. Please check your datasource.

SourceFileNotAccessible.description: The source file is not accessible.

SourceFileIsForbidden.description: Source file pre-authenticated URL is expired.

SourceFileNotFound.description: Source file was not found at location.

SourceFileCorrupted.description: The input file, %s, is likely corrupted. It cannot be opened by the connector. Try auditing & recovering the file in the product that has created it.

IncompleteDxfHeader.description: The input DXF file, %s, is invalid. It has an incomplete or missing HEADER section, and potentially other problems as well. Try fixing the file in AutoCAD.

InvalidChangesetGroupId.description: The Connector was provided an invalid changeset group ID by the orchestrator.

FailedToConnectToRemoteServerApplication.description: Failed to connect to the remote server application to retrieve files.

FailedToReaquireJobSubject.description: Failed to re-acquire job subject during processing. Unable to continue processing.

ECEFAlreadyExistsInIModel.description: The iModel already contains an ECEF coordinate system. The file with the projected GCS must be imported first.

AllFilesHaveFailed.description: Synchronization job was in the queue for too long and was canceled.

DwgMissingGeometry.description: Entity '%s' is not displayed, entity handle=0x%llx. This may or may not indicate a problem depending on whether the entity is displayed in the source CAD application.
